rows.label: tlk70000062_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, are you still trying to
scrounge up machine parts?

rows.label: tlk70000062_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I think I mentioned before,
but there are silver and
gold parts lying around.

rows.label: tlk70000062_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't forget - you'll need a
special Seeker device if you
want to find gold parts.
